Player History
Drove in 6 runs against Milwaukee on 4/3/1965...
Injured on 6/20/1965 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1967, hitting .480 with 6 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 7/24/1968 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1969, hitting .517 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1969, hitting .406 with 1 HR, 21 RBI...
Injured on 9/19/1969 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1971, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/17/1972 to a 1-year deal worth $1,470,600 per year...
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1973...
Injured on 6/27/1977 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/7/1980...
